H0.text: What is the family home of Cavendish's (Dukes of Devonshire). Hardwick Hall

H1.text: What is the family home of Cavendish's (Dukes of Devonshire). Bolton Abbey

H2.text: What is the family home of Cavendish's (Dukes of Devonshire). Castle Howard

H3.text: What is the family home of Cavendish's (Dukes of Devonshire). Chatsworth

A4.text: Chatsworth House is a stately home in the Derbyshire Dales... it has belonged to the Cavendish family since 1549.

A5.text: The family occupies rooms on the ground and first floors of the south front... the present (12th) Duke and Duchess live at Chatsworth.
